+          sort: '',

+        }
+

+                   .group('users.id')
+                   .with_all_associations_joined
+
+      @community = CommunityUsers.new(@params, @users)
+    end
+
+    context 'return filtered users' do
body: Since there's only one `context` I don't see the point in having it 😉  it just increases the indentation level in this case and does not really give more information.
